entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @AdamParkhomenko It would be interesting to know how many of these Foolish Protestors come down w/Covid19 in 5-14 days  We’re not leaving home till there’s a treatment or vaccine bec we wouldn’t survive it My Children & Grandchildren only FaceTime us because they don’t want to bring us virus
